labelAndPlaceholder.name: Full Name
labelAndPlaceholder.childseatMessage: Child seats each count as a seat in the vehicle. Baby strollers each count as a piece of luggage. Please consider this when choosing a vehicle.
labelAndPlaceholder.meetAndGreet: At the airport, waiting with a reception team for the arriving passengers. Additional charge applies:

success.title: We have received the booking
success.copy: We are pleased to inform you that your booking was successful! Thank you for your trust in our company.

error.title: Order was not accepted
error.copy: Unfortunately we cannot accept your order because our capacity has been exhausted. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

validation.timeFormat: Time should be in the format HH:MM
validation.name: Name is required
validation.emailFormat: This is not a valid email format
validation.conditions: Terms and conditions and privacy policy must be accepted to proceed with the order.
